review: Duke Nukem 3D: Megaton Edition really is the definitive package for any fan of the Duke Nukem series, or early FPS games of the 1990s. With now added multiplayer support; the classic 4-chapter 'Atomic Edition', as well as each of the 'rare'  expansions in one bundle, completely remastered and compatible with modern PCs (at least Windows 7 by my experience) is something definitely not to miss.
